title: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Oxford Shirt
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Tops, T-Shirts & Shirts > Polos
description: An American style standard since 1972 the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This roomy version is made with our highly breathable cotton mesh which offers a textured look and a soft feel. Ralph Lauren partners with Better Cotton™ to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton trains farmers to use water efficiently care for the health of the soil and natural habitats reduce use of the most harmful chemicals and implement the principles of decent work.

title: Tommy Hilfiger Long Sleeve Poplin Regular Fit, Men's Button Down Shirts, Also Available in Big and Tall
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Tops, T-Shirts & Shirts > Button-Down Shirts
description: Introducing Tommy Hilfiger's collection of men's button-down shirts, meticulously crafted for style and comfort. Made from 100% cotton, these long-sleeve casual shirts offer an extra level of softness, making them the perfect choice for everyday wear in any weather. Tommy Hilfiger's button-down shirts for men are constructed from premium organic cotton and feature detailed button-down collars, available in a range of solid colors, gingham, stripes, checks, and flannel designs. Comfortable and naturally breathable, these shirts are a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Designed with a regular fit that's slightly slimmer through the chest and shoulders, these long-sleeve button-down shirts offer a casual yet refined look, complete with signature flag embroidery. Pair them effortlessly with your favorite Tommy Hilfiger shorts, pants, jeans, or jackets for versatile styling options suitable for any occasion, whether it's a casual outing or a formal event. Ideal for daily wear, work, school, events, vacation, or sports, these men's shirts are a must-have. Treat yourself or surprise a loved one with this timeless piece, perfect for fathers, brothers, boyfriends, husbands, sons, or friends. Elevate your everyday style with the unbeatable quality and sophistication of Tommy Hilfiger's men's button-down shirts.

title: Under Par 2 Pack Men's Golf Polo Shirt in Waffle Knit with Stretch, Moisture Wicking and UV protection
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Activewear > Shirts & Tees > Polos
description: Introducing the UPTS2311 Men’s Twin Pack Waffle-Knit Polo Shirt, a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Crafted from 100% Polyester, this shirt offers exceptional durability and comfort. Engineered with 4-way stretch technology, it provides unmatched flexibility and freedom of movement, making it perfect for active lifestyles and on-and-off the course. Designed with moisture wicking properties, it ensures you stay dry and comfortable even during the most intense activities. Additionally, with UPF 50+ UV protection, it shields you from harmful sun rays, making it ideal for outdoor wear. The shirt features a stylish ribbed collar and cuffs with contrasting colour tipping, adding a modern touch to its classic design. It also includes a convenient 3-button placket for easy wear and ventilation. Complete with the iconic Under Par logo embroidered on the left chest, this twin-pack includes two polo shirts, combining performance-driven features with sleek aesthetics, making it a golfer’s wardrobe essential.

title: TuffStuff Pro Work Polo Shirt TS Short Sleeve
breadCrumbs: Fashion > Men > Clothing > Tops, T-Shirts & Shirts > Polos
description: The Pro Work Polo Shirt is a comfortable 240gsm shirt with an easy care fabric made of 50% Polyester and 50% Cotton. This stylish Polo Shirt features a taped neckline and contrast panels. These comfortable Pro Work Polo Shirts are suitable for those that work on construction sites as well as builders, carpenters, painters & decorators, plumbers, electricians, engineers and all other trade workers! Our Polo Shirts are available in Black, Grey and Navy as well as a variety of different sizes including Small, Medium, Large, Extra Large, XXL & 3XL. We have a wide variety of work clothes available including Hendon Hoodies, Hyperflex Joggers, Pro Work Trousers and Hatton Jackets. All of our clothing is available in different sizes, ranging from size S - XXL as well as different colour options so you can find what suits you best. TuffStuff is a Castle Clothing brand that is passionate about providing cost-effective products that are designed to perform well. For over 50 years, we have supplied generations of workers with garments that they can depend on. We are confident that all of our ranges will exceed your standards.

description: Step into the legendary Star Wars universe with this vintage-style men’s graphic tee, designed for fans who wear their fandom proudly. Featuring a bold, eye-catching print, this T-shirt is a standout in any collection of men’s graphic T-shirts. Crafted from soft, breathable fabric, it delivers all-day comfort without sacrificing style. Whether you're pairing it with jeans for a laid-back look or shorts for a casual day out, this Star Wars T-shirt adds a touch of iconic flair to your everyday wardrobe. Perfect for collectors and fans alike, this tee offers more than just style — it’s a tribute to the saga that defined generations. Explore our full range of men’s graphic tees where every design tells a story, and find the piece that lets your fandom shine.
